sentences.en: He matriculated in the English Literature Department at the Tokyo Imperial University.
sentences.cn: 他被东京帝国大学英语文学系录取了。

sentences.en: I had to matriculate if I wanted to do a degree.
sentences.cn: 如果我想攻读学位，必须先被录取入学。

sentences.en: If let her when instructor, she is about to become a professor after, even matriculate council.
sentences.cn: 假如让她当讲师, 以后她就要成为教授, 甚至进大学评议会.

sentences.en: In those days, I am firm matriculate, overflow in the library everyday stroll aimlessly.
sentences.cn: 那时, 我刚进大学, 每天在图书馆里漫无目的地闲逛.

sentences.en: That's why so many -- 40 percent – matriculate part time.
sentences.cn: 这就是为什么有40%的学生要半工半读.

sentences.en: The police arrest 8 person who forge and cadge the fake advice note of matriculate.
sentences.cn: 警察在本月初逮捕了8名伪造和贩卖假录取通知书的人.

words.tran_cn: 入学考试；大学入学许可；录取入学

trans.tran_en: In some countries, if you matriculate, you register formally as a student at a university, or you satisfy the academic requirements necessary for registration for a course
